LanguageData.Washing.label: washing
LanguageData.BadHygiene.label: bad hygiene
LanguageData.BadHygiene.description: Bad hygiene will increase risk of disease and impact social interaction.
LanguageData.BadHygiene.stages.0.label: moderate
LanguageData.BadHygiene.stages.1.label: severe
LanguageData.BadHygiene.stages.2.label: extreme
LanguageData.Diarrhea.label: diarrhea
LanguageData.Diarrhea.description: Diarrhea is loose, watery stools. Also known as bowel movements.
LanguageData.Diarrhea.stages.0.label: recovering
LanguageData.Diarrhea.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.Diarrhea.stages.2.label: initial
LanguageData.Dysentery.label: dysentery
LanguageData.Dysentery.description: Dysentery is a type of gastroenteritis that results in diarrhea with blood.
LanguageData.Dysentery.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.Dysentery.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.Dysentery.stages.2.label: extreme
LanguageData.Cholera.label: cholera
LanguageData.Cholera.description: Cholera is an infectious disease that causes severe watery diarrhea, which can lead to dehydration and even death if untreated.
LanguageData.Cholera.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.Cholera.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.Cholera.stages.2.label: extreme
LanguageData.Cholera.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.DBHDehydration.label: dehydration
LanguageData.DBHDehydration.description: Dehydration is a condition that can occur when the loss of body fluids, mostly water, exceeds the amount that is taken in.
LanguageData.DBHDehydration.stages.0.label: trivial
LanguageData.DBHDehydration.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.DBHDehydration.stages.2.label: moderate
LanguageData.DBHDehydration.stages.3.label: severe
LanguageData.DBHDehydration.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.BionicBladder.label: bionic bladder
LanguageData.HygieneEnhancer.label: hygiene enhancer
